about_the_game:
⚔️ Remnant Blade: The Scarlet Edge – Master the Art of Combat!

Enter the world of Remnant Blade: The Scarlet Edge, a fast-paced hack 'n' slash action game where skill and strategy define the battlefield. With a diverse roster of characters, each wielding unique movesets and combat styles, you’ll experience fluid, high-energy battles like never before.

Master the multi-stance combat system, seamlessly switching between stances and attack modes to chain devastating combos. Assemble your ultimate team, swap between characters mid-battle, and unleash powerful abilities to dominate your foes!

🔥 Game Modes:

  • Boss Fight Mode – Face off against formidable bosses with unique attack patterns.

  • Dungeon Mode – Explore perilous areas filled with enemies and loot.

  • Wave Attack Mode – Test your endurance against relentless waves of enemies.

  • And more!

🛡️ Key Features:

✅ Build Your Dream Team – Collect and customize a roster of powerful warriors.
✅ 3-Unit Mid-Battle Swapping – Strategically switch characters to chain abilities.
✅ Multi-Stance System – Certain characters can shift between fighting styles on the fly.
✅ Epic Loot & Power-Ups – Defeat enemies and bosses to earn gear & game-changing power-items.

Prepare for intense battles, fast-paced action, and limitless possibilities in Remnant Blade: The Scarlet Edge! Will you rise to the challenge?

name: Remnant Blade: The Scarlet Edge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8300H or AMD Ryzen 5 3550H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 560 (4 GB VRAM or higher)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10750H or AMD Ryzen 7 4800H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070 or AMD RX 5700 XT (8 GB VRAM or higher)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Unleash brutal combat in Remnant Blade: The Scarlet Edge, a fast-paced hack n slash with dynamic stances, unique characters, and deep combat mechanics. Master your moveset and dominate foes with precision and style.
